text: Raffaella Maria Roberta Pelloni (18 June 1943 – 5 July 2021), better known as Raffaella Carrà (), was an Italian singer, dancer, television presenter and actress. She was known for her 1976 album Forte forte forte. Her best known song was "A far l'amore comincia tu". Carrà starred in Caesar the Conqueror and Von Ryan's Express. Carrà died on 5 July 2021 in Rome of lung cancer, aged 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian singers Category:Italian television presenters Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian models Category:Italian dancers Category:People from Bologna
title: Raffaella Carrà
